text_block_list.text:
Recently, a puzzle solving game called 
"Uma Riddle" created by some students at 
the Academy has been gaining traction.

It seems the challenge is to solve a riddle 
on the premises, and Sakura Bakushin O is 
playing by recommendation of her 
classmates, but――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Auuuuuughhh―!! 
I can't solve this at aaaaaall!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm supposed to be the one who solves all 
riddles and leads by example, but this is 
not the example to be leading by!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Eeeeh!? That's very kind of you, but 
isn't that not a good example?
choice_data_list:
Your willingness to work with your Trainer is setting a 
good example.

Your willingness to work with your Trainer is setting a 
good example.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hm, well, then there's no problem! 
Let's show everyone our President Power!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmhm! 
"Hints can be obtained from Nakayama," 
so it says.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Nakayama, Nakayama… 
Speaking of Nakayama――
choice_data_list: Should we find it out from Nakayama Festa?
Can you figure it out by going to Nakayama Racecourse?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see! The famous "Nakayama" of the school 
is her, isn't it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There will always be obstacles to overcome! 
I'll get through them all with spirit and 
perseverance!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I found it, Nakayama-san! 
Now, do please give me a hint for the third 
"Uma Riddle"!!
choice_data_list:
If that's all you say, she's not going to get the 
message…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
No, it's called "You can get hints from 
Nayakami," ain't it? 
I'm that "Nakayama."

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…But, I can't tell you about it for free, 
y'know.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's this!?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Now, yer gonna play me for a clue. 
If you win, I'll tell you what 'cha 
wanna know.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Well, if you're Bakushin O, how about… 
bannin' the class president for a day?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Deal!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Don't you worry, Trainer! 
I'll use my President Power to make for 
absolute sure we win!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Now, those are the eyes of a winner…!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
I'll let you decide what you want to 
compete in. 
Let's have a smashin' showdown!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…Uh, my bad. 
Can you say that again?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed! 
Let us showdown with our respective 
President Powers!!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
What the…? 
President Power? What on earth are you 
talkin' about?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm talking about the appropriate attitude 
and behavior for a class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Nakayama! Let's have a competition to 
see who's better suited to be class 
president!
choice_data_list: …You can say no, just so you know.
…You can say no, just so you know.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Nah, a gambler never goes back on her 
word.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
'sides, the more grim the odds, the more 
I burn…!

Thus began a contest of President Power 
between the two.

It was a competition to see who could say 
and do the most class president-like things 
in various situations――

Sakura Bakushin O had the upper hand in 
the early stages, but Nakayama Festa 
persisted, and the battle between the two 
became fierce.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah… 
Now that's a victory for me…!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…Fu, I lost, eh. 
The Power of this President is intense.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
I'll give you the hint, as promised. 
Keep up the sick work, president!

After that, thanks to the hints she received, 
Sakura Bakushin O was able to finish 
solving the "Uma Riddle."

Sakura Bakushin O was in a good mood 
the whole time, partly because the ban on 
class president activities had been lifted.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see! When I think of Uma Musume, I think 
of racing! And by races, I mean racetracks!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, now that's straight to the core 
reasoning.
choice_data_list: But the racetrack is off campus…
But the racetrack is off campus…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No! If you look at the racetrack as a place 
of learning, you could say it's within the 
Academy!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'll be at Nakayama Racecourse this 
weekend! 
The clue to the mystery is at the Nakayama 
Racecourse!!

I'm not sure if her guess is correct, but 
going to Nakayama Racecourse isn't a bad 
idea.

It'll be a good opportunity to learn about 
Nakayama Racecourse while still solving 
the riddle.
The weekend came――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fu-fu-fu! 
Here we are, Nakayama Racetrack!
choice_data_list: Since we're here, let's take a tour.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative! I'll do a great job with both the Uma Riddle and researching the track!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Look, Trainer, at the uphill climb before the 
finish line!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If I can make it up that hill, the final 
obstacle, and finish in first place――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That would be a tremendous feeling, 
wouldn't it!
choice_data_list: Let's build up your strength for that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Naturally! 
Let's do it as flawlessly as ever!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And I shall make Sakura Bakushin O's 
name known at Nakayama Racetrack!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Once I've decided that much, I won't back 
down!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
We need to get back to the Academy and 
get some training in!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To a glorious future, Bakushiiiiiii―――n!!

It seemed that my voice hadn't reached her, 
and before I knew it, Sakura Bakushin O 
was out of sight.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Baku! Shin! 
Baku! Shin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fuu, I think that's it for today.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's the Prez! 
Nice work.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for that! 
Good work, everyone!!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
You said you were going to Nakayama 
Race Track, but did you decide not to～?

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text:
Well, "Nakayama" in "Uma Riddle" isn't 
Nakayama Racecourse to begin with…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
"Uma Riddle"… 
"Nakayama"…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aaahhhh!! I forgooooot―――!!!!!

In the end, Sakura Bakushin O was unable 
to solve the Uma Riddle until the end of 
the day, but――

The knowledge she gained about Nakayama 
Racecourse helped her grow a little.
